organization.description: The Federal Laboratory Consortium for Technology Transfer (FLC) is the nationwide network of federal laboratories that provides the forum to develop strategies and opportunities for linking laboratory mission technologies and expertise with the marketplace.
organization.title: Federal Laboratory Consortium
organization.name: federal-laboratory-consortium

name: power-service-shops
notes: TVA&#39;s Power Service Shops provides expert repair and maintenance of power system components and large industrial equipment.   With world-class maintenance facilities and a workforce of nearly 500, we offer fast and efficient service. Many of our services are mobile, so we can work at your location or at our 750,000-square-foot shop in Muscle Shoals, Alabama. The Power Service Center does maintenance and repair work for TVA&#39;s own generating system as well as for other utilities and industries. Read about our facility, workforce, and capacities in this overview of our services (PDF,184 kb). These fact sheets outline the range of our capabilities. Electrical Shop Services  Repair and rewinding of all sizes of motors in our Rotating Apparatus Department (104 kb, PDF). Refurbishing of transformers and bushings in our Transformer and Bushings Department (48 kb, PDF). Cleaning, testing, and calibration of instruments in our Instrumentation Department (52 kb, PDF). Mechanical Shop Services  Designing, building, or repairing almost any tool or component and applying specialized coatings in our Mechanical Services Department(76 kb, PDF). Many of these services can also be performed at your site.   Fabrication Shop Services  Fabrication of all types of components, including nuclear QA and ASME code work, in our Structural Fabrication Shop (64 kb, PDF). We can also train, test, and certify welders. Field Services: Hydro Plants  Hydro plant maintenance and repair, from routine service to complete overhauls and upgrades, through our Hydro Plant Repair Services (104 kb, PDF). Field Services: Steam Plants  Steam plant repair and maintenance for all types of power generating components through our Steam Plant Repair Services (56 kb, PDF).
title: Power Service Shops
